participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others through interests.
participant_1.background: I spent my last birthday at a reptile zoo with my friends. I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home. My dad worked for Home Depot. I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films. I love to watch The Voice.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, loves exploring new hobbies and spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad. I love to sew. My most valuable thing is my collection of Celtics memorabilia. I often spend hours researching vintage cars online. I am a marketing manager who is always on the go and needs to keep my energy up with lots of caffeine and cigarettes.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I just spent my birthday at a reptile zoo with my friends. It was really cool.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a reptile zoo before.
You should go! It was really cool to see all the different types of reptiles.
I will definitely have to do that sometime. What is your favorite type of reptile?
I think my favorite type of reptile is the Komodo dragon. They're so cool!
They are pretty cool! I've always been a fan of snakes myself.
Snakes are cool too! I used to have a pet snake when I was a kid.
Oh, what kind of snake was it?
It was a ball python. They're pretty docile snakes.
Ball pythons are really cool! I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're great pets.
I might have to do that someday
